forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Chat Lag Test Version

comments.text: Hi all! Today's v149 (you're on [version]) temporarily removes the voice quality improvements we did 5 months ago, to test if it's related to lag some of you have been getting.
Question: If you always had e.g. 4+-seconds-long delay between someone's voice would reach you, is that issue now permanently gone for you in this version?
Feedback to this will help us determine next steps (we wanna bring back the voice quality improvement, we just need to look where to apply the audio lag fix). Thx!
roboty voices and many cut-outs, it seems...
yeah, i'm getting that problem too.  people cutting out.

thread.latestCommentText: yeah, i'm getting that problem too.  people cutting out.
